explanation: There is a mix of bullish and bearish sentiment, but overall, many users are leaning bullish due to trendline breaks, anticipated pumps, and institutional interest. Several participants mention key support levels being held (e.g., 107200, 106500), and a few anticipate new all-time highs soon. Some short-term volatility and liquidations are mentioned, but the crowd sentiment is more positive than negative for BTC, especially compared to alts. There is also explicit encouragement from multiple users to buy or hold BTC, as well as references to BTC dominance and capital flowing from alts to BTC.
